About.title: About me
About.text:
A young man passionate about technology,
I began my educational journey in a technical high school in computer science and soon fell in love with development. After that, I enrolled in the Information Systems course at Estácio de Sá, where I discovered and specialized in creating mobile solutions using React Native and TypeScript.
Today, I work on freelance and personal projects using technologies such as TypeScript, ReactJs, React Native, NodeJS, MySQL, and JavaScript.

I am always seeking improvement and learning.

job1.title: Mobile Developer Freelancer
job1.description:
As a React Native developer, I developed an app for managing driver queues. 
Responsibilities: 
- Implement the entire process of registering, removing, and deleting drivers, vehicles, and clients.
- Manage the driver queue, including removing drivers from the queue, changing position, requesting trips by the client, and accepting or rejecting trips by the administrator, using global state with React Context API.
- Implement asynchronous requests using Axios.
- Integrate geolocation in React Native.
- Implement global theme with Styled-components.
- Manage and validate forms with React Hook Form and Zup.

job2.title: Fullstack Developer Freelancer
job2.description: As a full stack developer, I developed an efficient and responsive website to display available properties (CRUD) with filtering functionalities such as filtering by region, price, etc. The entire property management part was also implemented by the administrator (Creation, Removal, Deletion), as well as the client acquisition part, directing messages either via email or directly via WhatsApp. Technologies used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, PHP, MySQL.

job3.title: IT Support Intern
job3.description: As an IT support intern, I provided support to employees and also performed maintenance and modifications on the company's website.
